name: Olive Oil Sandwich Loaf and Pizza Base
description: An olive oil sandwich loaf or pizza base. This simple recipe makes a delicious bread for sandwiches or use to make thin crust pizzas.
recipeIngredient: 1.5 teaspoons quick rise yeast and .5 teaspoon active yeast

recipeInstructions.text: Warm 1/4 cup water and add suagr and yeast to it . Mix well and keep aside for 10 minutes or until frothy.
recipeInstructions.name: Warm 1/4 cup water and add suagr and yeast to it . Mix well and keep aside for 10 minutes or until frothy.

recipeInstructions.text: Grease the mixer bowl and add in the flours, salt and pepper. Mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Grease the mixer bowl and add in the flours, salt and pepper. Mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the oil , water and yeast mixture and knead for 10-12 minutes( batches of 3-4 minutes and then scrape the bowl and wait for the mixer to cool a little if too warm)
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the oil , water and yeast mixture and knead for 10-12 minutes( batches of 3-4 minutes and then scrape the bowl and wait for the mixer to cool a little if too warm)

recipeInstructions.text: Dough should be soft and pliable and non sticky.
recipeInstructions.name: Dough should be soft and pliable and non sticky.

recipeInstructions.text: Place dough in well oiled container, covered with plastic wrap in a warm place for 1.5 hours
recipeInstructions.name: Place dough in well oiled container, covered with plastic wrap in a warm place for 1.5 hours

recipeInstructions.text: Punch dough down and roll into 1/8th inch pizza base or shape into a loaf.
recipeInstructions.name: Punch dough down and roll into 1/8th inch pizza base or shape into a loaf.

itemListElement.text: Place loaf in well oiled bread pan and cover with a kitchen towel. Let rise for half an hour. Bake loaf at 375 degrees F for 30 minutes.
itemListElement.name: Place loaf in well oiled bread pan and cover with a kitchen towel. Let rise for half an hour. Bake loaf at 375 degrees F for 30 minutes.

itemListElement.text: If making pizza base, place the rolle dout base on greased parchment and let rise for 15 minutes before topping it up. Bake thin crust pizza at 425 degrees F for 10-12 minutes!
itemListElement.name: If making pizza base, place the rolle dout base on greased parchment and let rise for 15 minutes before topping it up. Bake thin crust pizza at 425 degrees F for 10-12 minutes!

keywords: olive oil bread, pizza base, vegan bread recipe
